text: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya telah pasti berlaku perkataan (ketentuan Allah) terhadap kebanyakan mereka, kerena mereka tidak beriman.
